# Support Agent Skills Index
# Generated: 2026-02-02

/skills/access-locked-out/SKILL.md - Restore access for customers who are locked out of their account or courses. Use when a paying customer cannot log in, access materials, or restore purchases.
/skills/api-documentation-question/SKILL.md - Answer API and technical documentation questions. Use when a customer asks about API usage, code implementation, or integration details.
/skills/broken-link-404-error/SKILL.md - Address broken links and missing resources. Use when a customer reports a 404 or a link to course or website content is not working.
/skills/certificate-request/SKILL.md - Provide guidance on completion certificates. Use when a customer asks for a course certificate or LinkedIn certificate details.
/skills/cohort-access-request/SKILL.md - Help with access to cohort materials and recordings. Use when a customer cannot find or access cohort content, workshop materials, or live session recordings.
/skills/cohort-schedule-inquiry/SKILL.md - Share cohort schedule information. Use when a customer asks about dates, timing, or when the next cohort starts.
/skills/continuing-education-credits/SKILL.md - Respond to CEU or professional credit inquiries. Use when a learner asks whether a course qualifies for continuing education credits.
/skills/corporate-invoice/SKILL.md - Handle corporate invoice and reimbursement requests. Use when a customer needs an invoice, VAT or tax info, or documentation for company reimbursement.
/skills/course-content-locked/SKILL.md - Restore access to purchased course content. Use when a customer has paid but content is locked, missing, or inaccessible.
/skills/course-difficulty-concern/SKILL.md - Advise on course difficulty and prerequisites. Use when a customer is unsure about the level or required knowledge.
/skills/discount-code-request/SKILL.md - Respond to discount or coupon requests. Use when a customer asks for a promo code or special pricing.
/skills/duplicate-purchase/SKILL.md - Resolve duplicate purchases. Use when a customer bought the same course or license twice or was charged twice.
/skills/email-change/SKILL.md - Transfer licenses to a new email address. Use when a customer wants to change account email, move a license, or update access after a job change.
/skills/email-delivery-failure/SKILL.md - Handle email delivery failures. Use when messages bounce or a customer reports not receiving emails.
/skills/event-sponsorship-request/SKILL.md - Handle event sponsorship inquiries. Use when organizers ask for sponsorship or support for conferences or hackathons.
/skills/gift-purchase-option/SKILL.md - Guide gift purchases. Use when a customer wants to buy a course for someone else.
/skills/installment-payment-option/SKILL.md - Answer payment plan questions. Use when a customer asks about installments or split payments for a course.
/skills/invoice-billing-statement/SKILL.md - Provide receipts and billing statements. Use when a customer needs an invoice, receipt, or payment confirmation for a completed purchase.
/skills/learning-path-guidance/SKILL.md - Recommend learning paths. Use when a customer asks which courses to take and in what order.
/skills/lesson-content-question/SKILL.md - Answer lesson-specific content questions. Use when a customer asks about a lesson, code example, or concept in a course.
/skills/login-link/SKILL.md - Provide login link help. Use when a customer cannot access courses and requests a login link or access email.
/skills/media-press-outreach/SKILL.md - Handle media and press outreach. Use when journalists or podcast producers request interviews, features, or press information.
/skills/nonprofit-government-discount/SKILL.md - Respond to nonprofit or government discount requests. Use when an organization asks about special pricing for nonprofit, education, or government.
/skills/outdated-course-content/SKILL.md - Handle reports of outdated course content. Use when a customer says material is old or no longer matches current technology.
/skills/partnership-collaboration-inquiry/SKILL.md - Handle partnership and collaboration inquiries. Use when a third party asks about partnerships, promotions, or collaborations.
/skills/password-reset-issue/SKILL.md - Help with password resets and account recovery. Use when a customer cannot reset their password or access their account.
/skills/payment-method-issue/SKILL.md - Resolve payment method problems. Use when a customer has trouble paying with a card, Apple Pay, or a regional payment option.
/skills/ppp-pricing/SKILL.md - Explain Purchasing Power Parity pricing. Use when a customer asks about PPP, regional pricing, affordability, or discount stacking.
/skills/pricing-inquiry/SKILL.md - Answer pricing questions for courses. Use when a customer asks about current price, pricing model, or availability.
/skills/refund-request/SKILL.md - Handle refund requests. Use when a customer asks for a refund, money back, or to cancel a purchase or subscription.
/skills/security-vulnerability-report/SKILL.md - Respond to security vulnerability reports. Use when a researcher reports a security issue or asks about bug bounty policy.
/skills/student-discount-request/SKILL.md - Respond to student discount inquiries. Use when a student or academic asks about educational pricing.
/skills/subscription-renewal-issue/SKILL.md - Resolve subscription renewal and charge issues. Use when a customer reports an unexpected renewal, charge, or missing renewal notice.
/skills/team-license-purchase/SKILL.md - Handle team and bulk license purchases. Use when an organization asks to buy multiple licenses for a team.
/skills/technical-issue-course-content/SKILL.md - Troubleshoot technical issues with course materials. Use when a customer reports video, code, or content not working.
/skills/two-factor-auth-issue/SKILL.md - Help with two-factor authentication problems. Use when a customer cannot get a 2FA code or device verification.
/skills/ui-ux-feedback/SKILL.md - Capture UI and UX feedback plus feature requests. Use when a customer shares design feedback or asks for product changes.
/skills/website-bug-report/SKILL.md - Handle website bug reports. Use when a customer reports site errors or platform issues.
/skills/workshop-attendance-confirmation/SKILL.md - Send workshop attendance confirmations. Use when a customer needs confirmation, calendar invites, or attendance details.
/skills/workshop-cancellation-notice/SKILL.md - Notify about workshop cancellations. Use when a scheduled workshop or session is canceled or rescheduled.
/skills/workshop-technical-setup/SKILL.md - Help with workshop technical setup. Use when a customer asks about required setup, tools, or preparation.
